text: so it's my pleasure to announce today
coming in early 2015 the AWS Service
Catalog and this will allow enterprise
products set up in the configuration in
the way that they want and deployed and
then they can make them easily
company on a portal of a host and then
it allows them to have fine grain access

the individual on the group on the

in different businesses and then again
they have that strong visibility as all
the activity is tracked in AWS cloud
